skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill

des: David A. Specht lost 125 pounds in 10 months, but that's not the whole story. Now he shares the lessons he's learned along the way to help others take back their health, and take control of their lives.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
